title: CTIA Recognizes ItsOn as One of the Wireless Industry's Top Innovators
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 2:53 PM   ItsOn 
REDWOOD CITY, Calif., Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ItsOn, Inc., the mobile IT cloud company, has been named a finalist for the CTIA 2015 annual Emerging Technology (E-Tech) Awards in the Wide Area Network category. According to CTIA, the finalists represent "some of the best mobile products and services that leverage, shape and transform our competitive and rapidly evolving industry." 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150908/264487LOGO 
ItsOn's leading edge technology platform enables mobile operators to employ a cloud-based IT system to instantly deliver customized services and offerings directly to consumers' devices through an embedded mobile client. This cloud-client solution allows carriers to engage their customers in ways that are contextually relevant, producing richer and more personalized smartphone experiences. 
ItsOn is experiencing growing demand from global mobile operators for its innovative solution consisting of on-device intelligence for engaging users, a cloud-based mobile IT system that is years ahead of legacy systems and an easy-to-use service design center. This combination of technologies enables mobile operators to transform their businesses into end-to-end digital service providers to empower consumers to purchase and manage mobile services instantly on their smart phones and respond to timely on-device offers without having to call customer service or visit a store. 
"We're thrilled to be recognized as one of the best mobile industry technology solutions in this year's CTIA competition," said Greg Raleigh, ItsOn CEO and founder. "We have deployed the world's most advanced solution to help mobile operators innovate and respond to market demands faster than was previously possible. We're pleased the industry is recognizing the value of our platform." 
CTIA's prestigious annual awards program attracts hundreds of entries. ItsOn was selected as one of five finalists in the Wide Area Network category. ItsOn will join CTIA for the awards ceremony at CTIA Super Mobility 2015 on Thursday, September 10 at 2:00 p.m. PT from the Networked Society Stage (Booth 3673) in the Sands Expo. 
About CTIA Super Mobility 2015 CTIA Super Mobility 2015 (ctiasupermobility2015.com) is the largest forum in the Western Hemisphere for the mobile innovations that power our connected life. More than 35,000 mobile professionals and executives and 1,100+ exhibitors from around the globe gather for this powerhouse technology event for its unrivaled networking opportunities and to share leading-edge trends, discoveries and knowledge. CTIA Super Mobility 2015 is held September 9, 10 & 11, 2015, at the Sands Expo and Convention Center in Las Vegas, USA. 
About ItsOn ItsOn is a proven leader in the carrier space, and enables wireless carriers to fundamentally change how mobile services are marketed, delivered and consumed. The company was founded in 2008, launched the world's first end-to-end solution for virtual policy and billing in 2014 and supports key carrier accounts such as Sprint and Virgin Mobile. ItsOn investors include Andreessen Horowitz, Tenaya Capital, Vodafone Ventures and Verizon Investments. The company is privately held and headquartered in Redwood City, CA. For more information, please visit www.itsoninc.com or follow @ItsOnInc on Twitter.
